text: Really interesting to hear how different this is compared to the final version. However, I'm in love with what they did at 2:05 - 2:42  It just sounds so good. It would be sick to see that part incorporated into a Phendrana Drifts cover/remix. I know I would

text: Nice to see a throwback to the second track ever posted on this list!

text: Always a memorable theme from Metroid Prime. Too much love!

text: Imo the better version

text: They should've used this for the Cliffs section instead of that Techno mix.

text: Soo great! :D

text: Aaah yes, the times when Nintendo didn't shy away from alien and horror elements. Good times.
author: ZzzZombi

text: Almost like a remix! I ain't even mad tho!
author: XxWOLFRxX

text: Awesome bso for an outstanding game. The only problem: I found 3 or 4 of the artifacts really hard to get without checking a guide. Other than that, the game is too cool (even cooler than the phendrama drifts heeee).
author: TonyBlundettoTV

text: love this song love this song love this song
author: Subliminal Messages

text:
I didn't know about this! Though I still prefer the in-game version, this is a nice initial version too. What is that vocal noise I can hear saying at 00:41?
Apparently Retro Studios have been called on by Nintendo to make another Metroid game. Alongside Federation Force hopefully, and not actually Federation Force.
author: Medal Melodies

text: I love the mix between organic alien choir and mechanic noises. Metroid OST are so underrated.
author: Maicon Berté

text:
+Maicon “Night” Berté I dunno if it's underrated but I've run into more than one sillyhead who thinks this game's soundtrack is weak or even outright bad.


Probably just people who don't like the game itself though.  Me, this is probably my favorite game of all time.
author: LinkMarioSamus

text: Never heard this version before. I think I prefer it.
author: ZachTheZip

text:
This is nice, but I certainly think they went in the right direction with removing the vocals and softening the drum track.
It's always good to see the steps people took when developing music.
author: PossumT

text: just slightly different
author: Reaper679

text: YES! Very deserving of being on the list. This fits very well with me on this day; Here in Ohio we have had a very warm December so far, and today was freezing cold (22 F) so this is perfect for tonight :D Thanks Supra.
author: Name

text: There's synthesized vocals at :45.
author: yuWIN

text: I figured I'd upload the demo version of this classic during my winter theme uploads. I think most people didn't even know about this! Of course, I'm used to the great original, but I also really like what I guess is an earlier draft. I really wonder what Retro is up to... please be Metroid Prime 4.
author: SupraDarky

text: +Sitting on Ceilings Federation Force is just a spinoff, I doubt it will have any major effect on the series.
author: redgyrados2000

text: +SupraDarky I remember the demo disk but not the amazing song on it, the nostalgism is all coming back now!
author: RichChanLikesTacos

text: +SupraDarky I really hope it's MP4 for NX
author: Hannah Sloat

text: I for one like what Retro is doing with Donkey Kong. When they finish their own Country trilogy then maybe they can go back to Metroid, although even then I would prefer for them to tackle a different series.
